verses.text_uthmani: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَلَمْ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَا ۜ

translations.text: All praise is for Allah Who has revealed the Book to His servant,<sup foot_note=76886>1</sup> allowing no crookedness in it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alhamdu lillahi allatheeanzala AAala AAabdihi alkitaba walam yajAAal lahuAAiwaja
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَيِّمًا لِّيُنذِرَ بَأْسًا شَدِيدًا مِّن لَّدُنْهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا

translations.text: ˹making it˺ perfectly upright, to warn ˹the disbelievers˺ of a severe torment from Him; to give good news to the believers—who do good—that they will have a fine reward,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qayyiman liyunthira ba/san shadeedanmin ladunhu wayubashshira almu/mineena allatheenayaAAmaloona assalihati anna lahum ajran hasana
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّـٰكِثِينَ فِيهِ أَبَدًا

translations.text: in which they will remain forever;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Makitheena feehi abada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدًا

translations.text: and to warn those who claim, “Allah has offspring.”<sup foot_note=76887>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayunthira allatheena qalooittakhatha Allahu walada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ وَلَا لِـَٔابَآئِهِمْ ۚ كَبُرَتْ كَلِمَةً تَخْرُجُ مِنْ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ ۚ إِن يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبًا

translations.text: They have no knowledge of this, nor did their forefathers. What a terrible claim that comes out of their mouths! They say nothing but lies.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lahum bihi min AAilmin walali-aba-ihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihimin yaqooloona illa kathiba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِمْ إِن لَّمْ يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا

translations.text: Now, perhaps you ˹O Prophet˺ will grieve yourself to death over their denial, if they ˹continue to˺ disbelieve in this message.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FalaAAallaka bakhiAAun nafsaka AAalaatharihim in lam yu/minoo bihatha alhadeethiasafa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ زِينَةً لَّهَا لِنَبْلُوَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا

translations.text: We have indeed made whatever is on earth as an adornment for it, in order to test which of them is best in deeds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna jaAAalna ma AAalaal-ardi zeenatan laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanuAAamala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّا لَجَـٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيْهَا صَعِيدًا جُرُزًا

translations.text: And We will certainly reduce whatever is on it to barren ground.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lajaAAiloona maAAalayha saAAeedan juruza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ حَسِبْتَ أَنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْكَهْفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُوا۟ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا عَجَبًا

translations.text: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ thought that the people of the cave and the plaque<sup foot_note=76888>1</sup> were ˹the only˺ wonders of Our signs?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am hasibta anna as-habaalkahfi warraqeemi kanoo min ayatinaAAajaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ أَوَى ٱلْفِتْيَةُ إِلَى ٱلْكَهْفِ فَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when those youths took refuge in the cave, and said, “Our Lord! Grant us mercy from Yourself and guide us rightly through our ordeal.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith awa alfityatu ilaalkahfi faqaloo rabbana atina minladunka rahmatan wahayyi/ lana min amrinarashada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَضَرَبْنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ فِى ٱلْكَهْفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدًا

translations.text: So We caused them to fall into a dead sleep<sup foot_note=76889>1</sup> in the cave for many years,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fadarabna AAala athanihimfee alkahfi sineena AAadada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَـٰهُمْ لِنَعْلَمَ أَىُّ ٱلْحِزْبَيْنِ أَحْصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓا۟ أَمَدًا

translations.text: then We raised them so We may show which of the two groups would make a better estimation of the length of their stay.<sup foot_note=76890>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma baAAathnahum linaAAlama ayyualhizbayni ahsa lima labithoo amada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نَّحْنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ نَبَأَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ فِتْيَةٌ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ وَزِدْنَـٰهُمْ هُدًى

translations.text: We relate to you ˹O Prophet˺ their story in truth. They were youths who truly believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nahnu naqussu AAalaykanabaahum bilhaqqi innahum fityatun amanoobirabbihim wazidnahum huda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَرَبَطْنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ إِذْ قَامُوا۟ فَقَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ لَن نَّدْعُوَا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَـٰهًا ۖ لَّقَدْ قُلْنَآ إِذًا شَطَطًا

translations.text: And We strengthened their hearts when they stood up and declared, “Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. We will never call upon any god besides Him, or we would truly be uttering an outrageous lie.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Warabatna AAalaquloobihim ith qamoo faqaloo rabbunarabbu assamawati wal-ardilan nadAAuwa min doonihi ilahan laqad qulna ithanshatata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمُنَا ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً ۖ لَّوْلَا يَأْتُونَ عَلَيْهِم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍۭ بَيِّنٍ ۖ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا

translations.text: ˹Then they said to one another,˺ “These people of ours have taken gods besides Him. Why do they not produce a clear proof of them? Who then does more wrong than those who fabricate lies against Allah?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Haola-i qawmuna ittakhathoomin doonihi alihatan lawla ya/toona AAalayhim bisultaninbayyinin faman athlamu mimmani iftara AAalaAllahi kathiba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذِ ٱعْتَزَلْتُمُوهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ فَأْوُۥٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلْكَهْفِ يَنشُرْ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِهِۦ وَيُهَيِّئْ لَكُم مِّنْ أَمْرِكُم مِّرْفَقًا

translations.text: Since you have distanced yourselves from them and what they worship besides Allah, take refuge in the cave. Your Lord will extend His mercy to you and accommodate you in your ordeal.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ithi iAAtazaltumoohum wamayaAAbudoona illa Allaha fa/woo ila alkahfiyanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi/ lakum minamrikum mirfaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَتَرَى ٱلشَّمْسَ إِذَا طَلَعَت تَّزَٰوَرُ عَن كَهْفِهِمْ ذَاتَ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَإِذَا غَرَبَت تَّقْرِضُهُمْ ذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِ وَهُمْ فِى فَجْوَةٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ مَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِ ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ وَلِيًّا مُّرْشِدًا

translations.text: And you would have seen the sun, as it rose, inclining away from their cave to the right, and as it set, declining away from them to the left, while they lay in its open space.<sup foot_note=76891>1</sup> That is one of the signs of Allah. Whoever Allah guides is truly guided. But whoever He leaves to stray, you will never find for them a guiding mentor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watara ashshamsa itha talaAAattazawaru AAan kahfihim thata alyameeni wa-ithagharabat taqriduhum thata ashshimaliwahum fee fajwatin minhu thalika min ayatiAllahi man yahdi Allahu fahuwa almuhtadi waman yudlilfalan tajida lahu waliyyan murshida
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَحْسَبُهُمْ أَيْقَاظًا وَهُمْ رُقُودٌ ۚ وَنُقَلِّبُهُمْ ذَاتَ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِ ۖ وَكَلْبُهُم بَـٰسِطٌ ذِرَاعَيْهِ بِٱلْوَصِيدِ ۚ لَوِ ٱطَّلَعْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ لَوَلَّيْتَ مِنْهُمْ فِرَارًا وَلَمُلِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ رُعْبًا

translation.text: and surely you would have been filled

translations.text: And you would have thought they were awake,<sup foot_note=76892>1</sup> though they were asleep. We turned them over, to the right and left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. Had you looked at them, you would have certainly fled away from them, filled with horror.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watahsabuhum ayqathanwahum ruqoodun wanuqallibuhum thata alyameeni wathataashshimali wakalbuhum basitun thiraAAayhibilwaseedi lawi ittalaAAta AAalayhimlawallayta minhum firaran walamuli/ta minhum ruAAba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ بَعَثْنَـٰهُمْ لِيَتَسَآءَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ ۚ قَالُوا۟ رَبُّكُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثْتُمْ فَٱبْعَثُوٓا۟ أَحَدَكُم بِوَرِقِكُمْ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ فَلْيَنظُرْ أَيُّهَآ أَزْكَىٰ طَعَامًا فَلْيَأْتِكُم بِرِزْقٍ مِّنْهُ وَلْيَتَلَطَّفْ وَلَا يُشْعِرَنَّ بِكُمْ أَحَدًا

translation.text: with this silver coin of yours
with this silver coin of yours
and let him bring to you

translations.text: And so We awakened them so that they might question one another. One of them exclaimed, “How long have you remained ˹asleep˺?” Some replied, “Perhaps a day, or part of a day.” They said ˹to one another˺, “Your Lord knows best how long you have remained. So send one of you with these silver coins of yours to the city, and let him find which food is the purest, and then bring you provisions from it. Let him be ˹exceptionally˺ cautious, and do not let him give you away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakathalika baAAathnahumliyatasaaloo baynahum qala qa-ilun minhumkam labithtum qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAdayawmin qaloo rabbukum aAAlamu bima labithtum fabAAathooahadakum biwariqikum hathihi ila almadeenatifalyanthur ayyuha azka taAAamanfalya/tikum birizqin minhu walyatalattaf walayushAAiranna bikum ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُمْ إِن يَظْهَرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ يَرْجُمُوكُمْ أَوْ يُعِيدُوكُمْ فِى مِلَّتِهِمْ وَلَن تُفْلِحُوٓا۟ إِذًا أَبَدًا

translations.text: For, indeed, if they find out about you, they will stone you ˹to death˺, or force you back into their faith, and then you will never succeed.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum in yathharoo AAalaykumyarjumookum aw yuAAeedookum fee millatihim walan tuflihooithan abada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعْثَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهَآ إِذْ يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَمْرَهُمْ ۖ فَقَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ عَلَيْهِم بُنْيَـٰنًا ۖ رَّبُّهُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِهِمْ ۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ غَلَبُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرِهِمْ لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ عَلَيْهِم مَّسْجِدًا

translations.text: That is how We caused them to be discovered so that their people might know that Allah’s promise ˹of resurrection˺ is true and that there is no doubt about the Hour.<sup foot_note=76893>1</sup> When the people disputed with each other about the case of the youth ˹after their death˺,<sup foot_note=76894>2</sup> some proposed, “Build a structure around them. Their Lord knows best about them.” Those who prevailed in the matter said, “We will surely build a place of worship over them.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakathalika aAAtharnaAAalayhim liyaAAlamoo anna waAAda Allahi haqqunwaanna asaAAata la rayba feeha ithyatanazaAAoona baynahum amrahum faqaloo ibnooAAalayhim bunyanan rabbuhum aAAlamu bihim qala allatheenaghalaboo AAala amrihim lanattakhithanna AAalayhimmasjida
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ ثَلَـٰثَةٌ رَّابِعُهُمْ كَلْبُهُمْ وَيَقُولُونَ خَمْسَةٌ سَادِسُهُمْ كَلْبُهُمْ رَجْمًۢا بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ وَيَقُولُونَ سَبْعَةٌ وَثَامِنُهُمْ كَلْبُهُمْ ۚ قُل رَّبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ بِعِدَّتِهِم مَّا يَعْلَمُهُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ ۗ فَلَا تُمَارِ فِيهِمْ إِلَّا مِرَآءً ظَـٰهِرًا وَلَا تَسْتَفْتِ فِيهِم مِّنْهُمْ أَحَدًا

translations.text: Some will say, “They were three, their dog was the fourth,” while others will say, “They were five, their dog was the sixth,” ˹only˺ guessing blindly. And others will say, “They were seven and their dog was the eighth.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “My Lord knows best their ˹exact˺ number. Only a few people know as well.” So do not argue about them except with sure knowledge,<sup foot_note=76895>1</sup> nor consult any of those ˹who debate˺ about them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sayaqooloona thalathatun rabiAAuhumkalbuhum wayaqooloona khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajmanbilghaybi wayaqooloona sabAAatun wathaminuhumkalbuhum qul rabbee aAAlamu biAAiddatihim ma yaAAlamuhumilla qaleelun fala tumari feehim illamiraan thahiran wala tastaftifeehim minhum ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَا۟ىْءٍ إِنِّى فَاعِلٌ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

translations.text: And never say of anything, “I will definitely do this tomorrow,”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala taqoolanna lishay-in innee faAAilunthalika ghada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱذْكُر رَّبَّكَ إِذَا نَسِيتَ وَقُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَهْدِيَنِ رَبِّى لِأَقْرَبَ مِنْ هَـٰذَا رَشَدًا

translations.text: without adding, “if Allah so wills!” But if you forget, then remember your Lord, and say, “I trust my Lord will guide me to what is more right than this.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa an yashaa Allahuwathkur rabbaka itha naseeta waqul AAasaan yahdiyani rabbee li-aqraba min hatha rashada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَبِثُوا۟ فِى كَهْفِهِمْ ثَلَـٰثَ مِا۟ئَةٍ سِنِينَ وَٱزْدَادُوا۟ تِسْعًا

translations.text: They had remained in their cave for three hundred years, adding nine.<sup foot_note=76896>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walabithoo fee kahfihim thalathami-atin sineena wazdadoo tisAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثُوا۟ ۖ لَهُۥ غَيْبُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ أَبْصِرْ بِهِۦ وَأَسْمِعْ ۚ مَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا يُشْرِكُ فِى حُكْمِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Allah knows best how long they stayed. With Him ˹alone˺ is ˹the knowledge of˺ the unseen of the heavens and the earth. How perfectly He hears and sees! They have no guardian besides Him, and He shares His command with none.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Quli Allahu aAAlamu bimalabithoo lahu ghaybu assamawati wal-ardiabsir bihi waasmiAA ma lahum min doonihi minwaliyyin wala yushriku fee hukmihi ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتْلُ مَآ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ مِن كِتَابِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ وَلَن تَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا

translations.text: Recite what has been revealed to you from the Book of your Lord. None can change His Words, nor can you find any refuge besides Him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watlu ma oohiya ilaykamin kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihiwalan tajida min doonihi multahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْبِرْ نَفْسَكَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلْعَشِىِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجْهَهُۥ ۖ وَلَا تَعْدُ عَيْنَاكَ عَنْهُمْ تُرِيدُ زِينَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا تُطِعْ مَنْ أَغْفَلْنَا قَلْبَهُۥ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ وَكَانَ أَمْرُهُۥ فُرُطًا

translations.text: And patiently stick with those who call upon their Lord morning and evening, seeking His pleasure.<sup foot_note=76897>1</sup> Do not let your eyes look beyond them, desiring the luxuries of this worldly life. And do not obey those whose hearts We have made heedless of Our remembrance, who follow ˹only˺ their desires and whose state is ˹total˺ loss.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasbir nafsaka maAAa allatheenayadAAoona rabbahum bilghadati walAAashiyyiyureedoona wajhahu wala taAAdu AAaynaka AAanhumtureedu zeenata alhayati addunya walatutiAA man aghfalna qalbahu AAan thikrinawattabaAAa hawahu wakana amruhu furuta
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُلِ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ فَلْيُؤْمِن وَمَن شَآءَ فَلْيَكْفُرْ ۚ إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ نَارًا أَحَاطَ بِهِمْ سُرَادِقُهَا ۚ وَإِن يَسْتَغِيثُوا۟ يُغَاثُوا۟ بِمَآءٍ كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَشْوِى ٱلْوُجُوهَ ۚ بِئْسَ ٱلشَّرَابُ وَسَآءَتْ مُرْتَفَقًا

translations.text: And say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹This is˺ the truth from your Lord. Whoever wills let them believe, and whoever wills let them disbelieve.” Surely We have prepared for the wrongdoers a Fire whose walls will ˹completely˺ surround them. When they cry for aid, they will be aided with water like molten metal, which will burn ˹their˺ faces. What a horrible drink! And what a terrible place to rest!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waquli alhaqqu min rabbikum faman shaafalyu/min waman shaa falyakfur inna aAAtadnaliththalimeena naran ahatabihim suradiquha wa-in yastagheethoo yughathoobima-in kalmuhli yashwee alwujooha bi/sa ashsharabuwasaat murtafaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ مَنْ أَحْسَنَ عَمَلًا

translations.text: As for those who believe and do good, We certainly never deny the reward of those who are best in deeds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati inna lanudeeAAu ajra man ahsana AAamala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمُ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَيَلْبَسُونَ ثِيَابًا خُضْرًا مِّن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلثَّوَابُ وَحَسُنَتْ مُرْتَفَقًا

translations.text: It is they who will have the Gardens of Eternity, with rivers flowing under their feet. There they will be adorned with bracelets of gold, and wear green garments of fine silk and rich brocade, reclining there on ˹canopied˺ couches. What a marvellous reward! And what a fabulous place to rest!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika lahum jannatu AAadnintajree min tahtihimu al-anharu yuhallawnafeeha min asawira min thahabin waylbasoonathiyaban khudran min sundusin wa-istabraqinmuttaki-eena feeha AAala al-ara-iki niAAma aththawabuwahasunat murtafaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا رَّجُلَيْنِ جَعَلْنَا لِأَحَدِهِمَا جَنَّتَيْنِ مِنْ أَعْنَـٰبٍ وَحَفَفْنَـٰهُمَا بِنَخْلٍ وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُمَا زَرْعًا

translations.text: Give them ˹O Prophet˺ an example of two men. To ˹the disbelieving˺ one We gave two gardens of grapevines, which We surrounded with palm trees and placed ˹various˺ crops in between.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadrib lahum mathalanrajulayni jaAAalna li-ahadihima jannataynimin aAAnabin wahafafnahuma binakhlinwajaAAalna baynahuma zarAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كِلْتَا ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ ءَاتَتْ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمْ تَظْلِم مِّنْهُ شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَفَجَّرْنَا خِلَـٰلَهُمَا نَهَرًا

translation.text: And We caused to gush forth

translations.text: Each garden yielded ˹all˺ its produce, never falling short. And We caused a river to flow between them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kilta aljannatayni atat okulahawalam tathlim minhu shay-an wafajjarna khilalahumanahara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانَ لَهُۥ ثَمَرٌ فَقَالَ لِصَـٰحِبِهِۦ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَنَا۠ أَكْثَرُ مِنكَ مَالًا وَأَعَزُّ نَفَرًا

translations.text: And he had other resources<sup foot_note=76898>1</sup> ˹as well˺. So he boasted to a ˹poor˺ companion of his, while conversing with him, “I am greater than you in wealth and superior in manpower.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakana lahu thamarun faqala lisahibihiwahuwa yuhawiruhu ana aktharu minka malanwaaAAazzu nafara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا

translations.text: And he entered his property, while wronging his soul, saying, “I do not think this will ever perish,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa thalimunlinafsihi qala ma athunnu an tabeedahathihi abada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةً وَلَئِن رُّدِدتُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى لَأَجِدَنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهَا مُنقَلَبًا

translations.text: nor do I think the Hour will ˹ever˺ come. And if in fact I am returned to my Lord, I will definitely get a far better outcome than ˹all˺ this.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama athunnu assaAAataqa-imatan wala-in rudidtu ila rabbee laajidannakhayran minha munqalaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَهُۥ صَاحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرْتَ بِٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰكَ رَجُلًا

translations.text: His ˹believing˺ companion replied, while conversing with him, “Do you disbelieve in the One Who created you from dust,<sup foot_note=76899>1</sup> then ˹developed you˺ from a sperm-drop, then formed you into a man?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhuakafarta billathee khalaqaka min turabinthumma min nutfatin thumma sawwaka rajula
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّـٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِرَبِّىٓ أَحَدًا

translations.text: But as for me: He is Allah, my Lord, and I will never associate anyone with my Lord ˹in worship˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lakinna huwa Allahu rabbee walaoshriku birabbee ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْلَآ إِذْ دَخَلْتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلْتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا

translations.text: If only you had said, upon entering your property, ‘This is what Allah has willed! There is no power except with Allah!’ Even though you see me inferior to you in wealth and offspring,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walawla ith dakhalta jannatakaqulta ma shaa Allahu la quwwata illabillahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malanwawalada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَعَسَىٰ رَبِّىٓ أَن يُؤْتِيَنِ خَيْرًا مِّن جَنَّتِكَ وَيُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهَا حُسْبَانًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتُصْبِحَ صَعِيدًا زَلَقًا

translations.text: perhaps my Lord will grant me ˹something˺ better than your garden, and send down upon your garden a thunderbolt from the sky, turning it into a barren waste.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaAAasa rabbee an yu/tiyani khayranmin jannatika wayursila AAalayha husbananmina assama-i fatusbiha saAAeedanzalaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوْ يُصْبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوْرًا فَلَن تَسْتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبًا

translations.text: Or its water may sink ˹into the earth˺, and then you will never be able to seek it out.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aw yusbiha maohaghawran falan tastateeAAa lahu talaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصْبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيْهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُشْرِكْ بِرَبِّىٓ أَحَدًا

translations.text: And so all his produce was ˹totally˺ ruined, so he started to wring his hands for all he had spent on it, while it had collapsed on its trellises. He cried, “Alas! I wish I had never associated anyone with my Lord ˹in worship˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waoheeta bithamarihi faasbahayuqallibu kaffayhi AAala ma anfaqa feehawahiya khawiyatun AAala AAurooshihawayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oshrik birabbee ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٌ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

translations.text: And he had no manpower to help him against Allah, nor could he ˹even˺ help himself.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walam takun lahu fi-atun yansuroonahumin dooni Allahi wama kana muntasira
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هُنَالِكَ ٱلْوَلَـٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ هُوَ خَيْرٌ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ عُقْبًا

translations.text: At this time, support comes ˹only˺ from Allah—the True ˹Lord˺. He is best in reward and best in outcome.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hunalika alwalayatu lillahialhaqqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun AAuqba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخْتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَصْبَحَ هَشِيمًا تَذْرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحُ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مُّقْتَدِرًا

translations.text: And give them a parable of this worldly life. ˹It is˺ like the plants of the earth, thriving when sustained by the rain We send down from the sky. Then they ˹soon˺ turn into chaff scattered by the wind. And Allah is fully capable of ˹doing˺ all things.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadrib lahum mathala alhayatiaddunya kama-in anzalnahu mina assama-ifakhtalata bihi nabatu al-ardi faasbahahasheeman tathroohu arriyahu wakanaAllahu AAala kulli shay-in muqtadira
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلْمَالُ وَٱلْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ أَمَلًا

translations.text: Wealth and children are the adornment of this worldly life, but the everlasting good deeds are far better with your Lord in reward and in hope.<sup foot_note=76900>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Almalu walbanoona zeenatu alhayatiaddunya walbaqiyatu assalihatukhayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun amala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ نُسَيِّرُ ٱلْجِبَالَ وَتَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ بَارِزَةً وَحَشَرْنَـٰهُمْ فَلَمْ نُغَادِرْ مِنْهُمْ أَحَدًا

translations.text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day We will blow the mountains away, and you will see the earth laid bare. And We will gather all ˹humankind˺, leaving none behind.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma nusayyiru aljibala wataraal-arda barizatan wahasharnahum falamnughadir minhum ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعُرِضُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ صَفًّا لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمُونَا كَمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۭ ۚ بَلْ زَعَمْتُمْ أَلَّن نَّجْعَلَ لَكُم مَّوْعِدًا

translations.text: They will be presented before your Lord in rows, ˹and the deniers will be told,˺ “You have surely returned to Us ˹all alone˺ as We created you the first time, although you ˹always˺ claimed that We would never appoint a time for your return.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAuridoo AAala rabbika saffanlaqad ji/tumoona kama khalaqnakum awwalamarratin bal zaAAamtum allan najAAala lakum mawAAida
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ فَتَرَى ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ مُشْفِقِينَ مِمَّا فِيهِ وَيَقُولُونَ يَـٰوَيْلَتَنَا مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا يُغَادِرُ صَغِيرَةً وَلَا كَبِيرَةً إِلَّآ أَحْصَىٰهَا ۚ وَوَجَدُوا۟ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ حَاضِرًا ۗ وَلَا يَظْلِمُ رَبُّكَ أَحَدًا

translations.text: And the record ˹of deeds˺ will be laid ˹open˺, and you will see the wicked in fear of what is ˹written˺ in it. They will cry, “Woe to us! What kind of record is this that does not leave any sin, small or large, unlisted?” They will find whatever they did present ˹before them˺. And your Lord will never wrong anyone.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WawudiAAa alkitabu fataraalmujrimeena mushfiqeena mimma feehi wayaqooloona yawaylatana ma lihatha alkitabi layughadiru sagheeratan wala kabeeratan illaahsaha wawajadoo ma AAamiloo hadiranwala yathlimu rabbuka ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَفَسَقَ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۗ أَفَتَتَّخِذُونَهُۥ وَذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِى وَهُمْ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّۢ ۚ بِئْسَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَدَلًا

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when We said to the angels, “Prostrate before Adam,” so they all did—but not Iblîs,<sup foot_note=76901>1</sup> who was one of the jinn, but he rebelled against the command of his Lord. Would you then take him and his descendants as patrons instead of Me, although they are your enemy? What an evil alternative for the wrongdoers ˹to choose˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ith qulna lilmala-ikatiosjudoo li-adama fasajadoo illa ibleesa kanamina aljinni fafasaqa AAan amri rabbihi afatattakhithoonahuwathurriyyatahu awliyaa min doonee wahum lakumAAaduwwun bi/sa liththalimeena badala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ مَّآ أَشْهَدتُّهُمْ خَلْقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا خَلْقَ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلْمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدًا

translations.text: I never called them to witness the creation of the heavens and the earth or ˹even˺ their own creation, nor would I take the misleaders as helpers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma ashhadtuhum khalqa assamawatiwal-ardi wala khalqa anfusihim wamakuntu muttakhitha almudilleena AAaduda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ يَقُولُ نَادُوا۟ شُرَكَآءِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُمْ فَدَعَوْهُمْ فَلَمْ يَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُم مَّوْبِقًا

translations.text: And ˹beware of˺ the Day He will say, “Call upon those you claimed were My associate-gods.” So they will call them, but will receive no response. And We will make them ˹all˺ share in the same doom.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma yaqoolu nadoo shuraka-iyaallatheena zaAAamtum fadaAAawhum falam yastajeeboo lahumwajaAAalna baynahum mawbiqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَرَءَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ عَنْهَا مَصْرِفًا

translations.text: The wicked will see the Fire and realize that they are bound to fall into it, and will find no way to avoid it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waraa almujrimoona annarafathannoo annahum muwaqiAAooha walamyajidoo AAanha masrifa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَا فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَكْثَرَ شَىْءٍ جَدَلًا

translations.text: We have surely set forth in this Quran every ˹kind of˺ lesson for people, but humankind is the most argumentative of all beings.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad sarrafna fee hathaalqur-ani linnasi min kulli mathalin wakanaal-insanu akthara shay-in jadala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤْمِنُوٓا۟ إِذْ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن تَأْتِيَهُمْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ أَوْ يَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ قُبُلًا

translations.text: And nothing prevents people from believing when guidance comes to them and from seeking their Lord’s forgiveness except ˹their demand˺ to meet the same fate of earlier deniers or that the torment would confront them face to face.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama manaAAa annasa anyu/minoo ith jaahumu alhuda wayastaghfiroorabbahum illa an ta/tiyahum sunnatu al-awwaleena awya/tiyahumu alAAathabu qubula
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا نُرْسِلُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ ۚ وَيُجَـٰدِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا۟ بِهِ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِى وَمَآ أُنذِرُوا۟ هُزُوًا

translations.text: We do not send the messengers except as deliverers of good news and warners. But the disbelievers argue in falsehood, ˹hoping˺ to discredit the truth with it, and make a mockery of My revelations and warnings.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama nursilu almursaleena illamubashshireena wamunthireena wayujadilu allatheenakafaroo bilbatili liyudhidoo bihi alhaqqawattakhathoo ayatee wama onthiroohuzuwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ فَأَعْرَضَ عَنْهَا وَنَسِىَ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ ۚ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفْقَهُوهُ وَفِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَقْرًا ۖ وَإِن تَدْعُهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ فَلَن يَهْتَدُوٓا۟ إِذًا أَبَدًا

translations.text: And who does more wrong than those who, when reminded of their Lord’s revelations, turn away from them and forget what their own hands have done? We have certainly cast veils over their hearts—leaving them unable to comprehend this ˹Quran˺—and deafness in their ears. And if you ˹O Prophet˺ invite them to ˹true˺ guidance, they will never be ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman athlamu mimman thukkirabi-ayati rabbihi faaAArada AAanhawanasiya ma qaddamat yadahu inna jaAAalnaAAala quloobihim akinnatan an yafqahoohu wafee athanihimwaqran wa-in tadAAuhum ila alhuda falan yahtadoo ithanabada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ذُو ٱلرَّحْمَةِ ۖ لَوْ يُؤَاخِذُهُم بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ۚ بَل لَّهُم مَّوْعِدٌ لَّن يَجِدُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَوْئِلًا

translations.text: Your Lord is the All-Forgiving, Full of Mercy. If He were to seize them ˹immediately˺ for what they commit, He would have certainly hastened their punishment. But they have an appointed time, from which they will find no refuge.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Warabbuka alghafooru thoo arrahmatilaw yu-akhithuhum bima kasaboo laAAajjalalahumu alAAathaba bal lahum mawAAidun lan yajidoo mindoonihi maw-ila
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتِلْكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ لَمَّا ظَلَمُوا۟ وَجَعَلْنَا لِمَهْلِكِهِم مَّوْعِدًا

translations.text: Those ˹are the˺ societies We destroyed when they persisted in wrong,<sup foot_note=76902>1</sup> and We had set a time for their destruction.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watilka alqura ahlaknahum lammathalamoo wajaAAalna limahlikihim mawAAida
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِفَتَىٰهُ لَآ أَبْرَحُ حَتَّىٰٓ أَبْلُغَ مَجْمَعَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ أَوْ أَمْضِىَ حُقُبًا

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when Moses said to his young assistant, “I will never give up until I reach the junction of the two seas, even if I travel for ages.”<sup foot_note=76903>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ith qala moosa lifatahula abrahu hatta ablugha majmaAAa albahrayniaw amdiya huquba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَا مَجْمَعَ بَيْنِهِمَا نَسِيَا حُوتَهُمَا فَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ سَرَبًا

translations.text: But when they ˹finally˺ reached the point where the seas met, they forgot their ˹salted˺ fish, and it made its way into the sea, slipping away ˹wondrously˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma balagha majmaAAabaynihima nasiya hootahuma fattakhathasabeelahu fee albahri saraba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدْ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَـٰذَا نَصَبًا

translations.text: When they had passed further, he said to his assistant, “Bring us our meal! We have certainly been exhausted by today’s journey.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jawaza qalalifatahu atina ghadaana laqadlaqeena min safarina hatha nasaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَرَءَيْتَ إِذْ أَوَيْنَآ إِلَى ٱلصَّخْرَةِ فَإِنِّى نَسِيتُ ٱلْحُوتَ وَمَآ أَنسَىٰنِيهُ إِلَّا ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَنْ أَذْكُرَهُۥ ۚ وَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ عَجَبًا

translations.text: He replied, “Do you remember when we rested by the rock? ˹That is when˺ I forgot the fish. None made me forget to mention this except Satan. And the fish made its way into the sea miraculously.”<sup foot_note=76904>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala araayta ith awaynaila assakhrati fa-innee naseetu alhootawama ansaneehu illa ashshaytanuan athkurahu wattakhatha sabeelahu fee albahriAAajaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبْغِ ۚ فَٱرْتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصًا

translations.text: Moses responded, “That is ˹exactly˺ what we were looking for.”<sup foot_note=76905>1</sup> So they returned, retracing their footsteps.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala thalika ma kunnanabghi fartadda AAala atharihimaqasasa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَجَدَا عَبْدًا مِّنْ عِبَادِنَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّا عِلْمًا

translations.text: There they found a servant of Ours, to whom We had granted mercy from Us and enlightened with knowledge of Our Own.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawajada AAabdan min AAibadinaataynahu rahmatan min AAindinawaAAallamnahu min ladunna AAilma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ هَلْ أَتَّبِعُكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُعَلِّمَنِ مِمَّا عُلِّمْتَ رُشْدًا

translations.text: Moses said to him, “May I follow you, provided that you teach me some of the right guidance you have been taught?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala lahu moosa halattabiAAuka AAala an tuAAallimani mimma AAullimtarushda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا

translations.text: He said, “You certainly cannot be patient ˹enough˺ with me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala innaka lan tastateeAAamaAAiya sabra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَيْفَ تَصْبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ خُبْرًا

translations.text: And how can you be patient with what is beyond your ˹realm of˺ knowledge?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakayfa tasbiru AAala malam tuhit bihi khubra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرًا وَلَآ أَعْصِى لَكَ أَمْرًا

translations.text: Moses assured ˹him˺, “You will find me patient, Allah willing, and I will not disobey any of your orders.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala satajidunee in shaa Allahusabiran wala aAAsee laka amra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَإِنِ ٱتَّبَعْتَنِى فَلَا تَسْـَٔلْنِى عَن شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ أُحْدِثَ لَكَ مِنْهُ ذِكْرًا

translations.text: He responded, “Then if you follow me, do not question me about anything until I ˹myself˺ clarify it for you.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fa-ini ittabaAAtanee falatas-alnee AAan shay-in hatta ohditha lakaminhu thikra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِى ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَا ۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقْتَهَا لِتُغْرِقَ أَهْلَهَا لَقَدْ جِئْتَ شَيْـًٔا إِمْرًا

translation.text: he made a hole in it
Have you made a hole in it

translations.text: So they set out, but after they had boarded a ship, the man made a hole in it. Moses protested, “Have you done this to drown its people? You have certainly done a terrible thing!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fantalaqa hattaitha rakiba fee assafeenati kharaqahaqala akharaqtaha litughriqa ahlaha laqadji/ta shay-an imra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا

translations.text: He replied, “Did I not say that you cannot have patience with me?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala alam aqul innaka lan tastateeAAamaAAiya sabra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذْنِى بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرْهِقْنِى مِنْ أَمْرِى عُسْرًا

translations.text: Moses pleaded, “Excuse me for forgetting, and do not be hard on me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala la tu-akhithneebima naseetu wala turhiqnee min amree AAusra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا لَقِيَا غُلَـٰمًا فَقَتَلَهُۥ قَالَ أَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا زَكِيَّةًۢ بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ لَّقَدْ جِئْتَ شَيْـًٔا نُّكْرًا

translations.text: So they proceeded until they came across a boy, and the man killed him. Moses protested, “Have you killed an innocent soul, who killed no one? You have certainly done a horrible thing.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fantalaqa hattaitha laqiya ghulaman faqatalahu qalaaqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad ji/ta shay-annukra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا

translations.text: He answered, “Did I not tell you that you cannot have patience with me?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastateeAAamaAAiya sabra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِن سَأَلْتُكَ عَن شَىْءٍۭ بَعْدَهَا فَلَا تُصَـٰحِبْنِى ۖ قَدْ بَلَغْتَ مِن لَّدُنِّى عُذْرًا

translations.text: Moses replied, “If I ever question you about anything after this, then do not keep me in your company, for by then I would have given you enough of an excuse.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala in saaltuka AAan shay-in baAAdahafala tusahibnee qad balaghta min ladunnee AAuthra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَيَآ أَهْلَ قَرْيَةٍ ٱسْتَطْعَمَآ أَهْلَهَا فَأَبَوْا۟ أَن يُضَيِّفُوهُمَا فَوَجَدَا فِيهَا جِدَارًا يُرِيدُ أَن يَنقَضَّ فَأَقَامَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ لَوْ شِئْتَ لَتَّخَذْتَ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا

translations.text: So they moved on until they came to the people of a town. They asked them for food, but the people refused to give them hospitality. There they found a wall ready to collapse, so the man set it right. Moses protested, “If you wanted, you could have demanded a fee for this.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fantalaqa hattaitha ataya ahla qaryatin istatAAamaahlaha faabaw an yudayyifoohuma fawajadafeeha jidaran yureedu an yanqadda faaqamahuqala law shi/ta lattakhathta AAalayhi ajra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هَـٰذَا فِرَاقُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنِكَ ۚ سَأُنَبِّئُكَ بِتَأْوِيلِ مَا لَمْ تَسْتَطِع عَّلَيْهِ صَبْرًا

translations.text: He replied, “This is the parting of our ways. I will explain to you what you could not bear patiently.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hatha firaqubaynee wabaynika saonabbi-oka bita/weeli ma lam tastatiAAAAalayhi sabra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّا ٱلسَّفِينَةُ فَكَانَتْ لِمَسَـٰكِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ فَأَرَدتُّ أَنْ أَعِيبَهَا وَكَانَ وَرَآءَهُم مَّلِكٌ يَأْخُذُ كُلَّ سَفِينَةٍ غَصْبًا

translations.text: “As for the ship, it belonged to some poor people, working at sea. So I intended to damage it, for there was a ˹tyrant˺ king ahead of them who seizes every ˹good˺ ship by force.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amma assafeenatu fakanatlimasakeena yaAAmaloona fee albahri faaradtu anaAAeebaha wakana waraahum malikun ya/khuthukulla safeenatin ghasba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا ٱلْغُلَـٰمُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤْمِنَيْنِ فَخَشِينَآ أَن يُرْهِقَهُمَا طُغْيَـٰنًا وَكُفْرًا

translations.text: “And as for the boy, his parents were ˹true˺ believers, and we<sup foot_note=76906>1</sup> feared that he would pressure them into defiance and disbelief.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma alghulamu fakanaabawahu mu/minayni fakhasheena an yurhiqahumatughyanan wakufra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَرَدْنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهُ زَكَوٰةً وَأَقْرَبَ رُحْمًا

translations.text: So we hoped that their Lord would give them another, more virtuous and caring in his place.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaradna an yubdilahumarabbuhuma khayran minhu zakatan waaqraba ruhma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا ٱلْجِدَارُ فَكَانَ لِغُلَـٰمَيْنِ يَتِيمَيْنِ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ وَكَانَ تَحْتَهُۥ كَنزٌ لَّهُمَا وَكَانَ أَبُوهُمَا صَـٰلِحًا فَأَرَادَ رَبُّكَ أَن يَبْلُغَآ أَشُدَّهُمَا وَيَسْتَخْرِجَا كَنزَهُمَا رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ وَمَا فَعَلْتُهُۥ عَنْ أَمْرِى ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَأْوِيلُ مَا لَمْ تَسْطِع عَّلَيْهِ صَبْرًا

translations.text: “And as for the wall, it belonged to two orphan boys in the city, and under the wall was a treasure that belonged to them, and their father had been a righteous man. So your Lord willed that these children should come of age and retrieve their treasure, as a mercy from your Lord. I did not do it ˹all˺ on my own. This is the explanation of what you could not bear patiently.”<sup foot_note=76907>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma aljidaru fakanalighulamayni yateemayni fee almadeenati wakana tahtahukanzun lahuma wakana aboohuma salihanfaarada rabbuka an yablugha ashuddahumawayastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatan min rabbikawama faAAaltuhu AAan amree thalika ta/weelu malam tastiAA AAalayhi sabra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِى ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ ۖ قُلْ سَأَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْهُ ذِكْرًا

translations.text: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ about Ⱬul-Qarnain. Say, “I will relate to you something of his narrative.”<sup foot_note=76908>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayas-aloonaka AAan thee alqarnayniqul saatloo AAalaykum minhu thikra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ سَبَبًا

translations.text: Surely We established him in the land, and gave him the means to all things.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna makkanna lahu fee al-ardiwaataynahu min kulli shay-in sababa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَتْبَعَ سَبَبًا

translations.text: So he travelled a course,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaatbaAAa sababa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغْرِبَ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغْرُبُ فِى عَيْنٍ حَمِئَةٍ وَوَجَدَ عِندَهَا قَوْمًا ۗ قُلْنَا يَـٰذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ إِمَّآ أَن تُعَذِّبَ وَإِمَّآ أَن تَتَّخِذَ فِيهِمْ حُسْنًا

translations.text: until he reached the setting ˹point˺ of the sun, which appeared to him to be setting in a spring of murky water, where he found some people. We said, “O Ⱬul-Qarnain! Either punish them or treat them kindly.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha balaghamaghriba ashshamsi wajadaha taghrubu fee AAaynin hami-atinwawajada AAindaha qawman qulna ya thaalqarnayni imma an tuAAaththiba wa-imma antattakhitha feehim husna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوْفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابًا نُّكْرًا

translations.text: He responded, “Whoever does wrong will be punished by us, then will be returned to their Lord, Who will punish them with a horrible torment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala amma man thalamafasawfa nuAAaththibuhu thumma yuraddu ila rabbihifayuAAaththibuhu AAathaban nukra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنْ أَمْرِنَا يُسْرًا

translations.text: As for those who believe and do good, they will have the finest reward, and we will assign them easy commands.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma man amana waAAamila salihanfalahu jazaan alhusna wasanaqoolu lahu minamrina yusra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَتْبَعَ سَبَبًا

translations.text: Then he travelled a ˹different˺ course
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma atbaAAa sababa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَطْلِعَ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَطْلُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍ لَّمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُم مِّن دُونِهَا سِتْرًا

translations.text: until he reached the rising ˹point˺ of the sun. He found it rising on a people for whom We had provided no shelter from it.<sup foot_note=76909>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha balagha matliAAaashshamsi wajadaha tatluAAu AAalaqawmin lam najAAal lahum min dooniha sitra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ وَقَدْ أَحَطْنَا بِمَا لَدَيْهِ خُبْرًا

translations.text: So it was. And We truly had full knowledge of him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika waqad ahatnabima ladayhi khubra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَتْبَعَ سَبَبًا

translations.text: Then he travelled a ˹third˺ course
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma atbaAAa sababa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيْنَ ٱلسَّدَّيْنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوْمًا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفْقَهُونَ قَوْلًا

translations.text: until he reached ˹a pass˺ between two mountains. He found in front of them a people who could hardly understand ˹his˺ language.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha balaghabayna assaddayni wajada min doonihima qawman layakadoona yafqahoona qawla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ إِنَّ يَأْجُوجَ وَمَأْجُوجَ مُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَهَلْ نَجْعَلُ لَكَ خَرْجًا عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَجْعَلَ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَهُمْ سَدًّا

translations.text: They pleaded, “O Ⱬul-Qarnain! Surely Gog and Magog<sup foot_note=76910>1</sup> are spreading corruption throughout the land. Should we pay you tribute, provided that you build a wall between us and them?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ya tha alqarnayniinna ya/jooja wama/jooja mufsidoona fee al-ardi fahalnajAAalu laka kharjan AAala an tajAAala baynanawabaynahum sadda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّى فِيهِ رَبِّى خَيْرٌ فَأَعِينُونِى بِقُوَّةٍ أَجْعَلْ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُمْ رَدْمًا

translations.text: He responded, “What my Lord has provided for me is far better. But assist me with resources, and I will build a barrier between you and them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ma makkannee feehi rabbeekhayrun faaAAeenoonee biquwwatin ajAAal baynakum wabaynahum radma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَاتُونِى زُبَرَ ٱلْحَدِيدِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا سَاوَىٰ بَيْنَ ٱلصَّدَفَيْنِ قَالَ ٱنفُخُوا۟ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَعَلَهُۥ نَارًا قَالَ ءَاتُونِىٓ أُفْرِغْ عَلَيْهِ قِطْرًا

translations.text: Bring me blocks of iron!” Then, when he had filled up ˹the gap˺ between the two mountains, he ordered, “Blow!” When the iron became red hot, he said, “Bring me molten copper to pour over it.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Atoonee zubara alhadeedi hattaitha sawa bayna asadafayni qalaonfukhoo hatta itha jaAAalahu naran qalaatoonee ofrigh AAalayhi qitra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا ٱسْطَـٰعُوٓا۟ أَن يَظْهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ لَهُۥ نَقْبًا

translations.text: And so the enemies could neither scale nor tunnel through it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama istaAAoo an yathharoohuwama istataAAoo lahu naqba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَحْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعْدُ رَبِّى جَعَلَهُۥ دَكَّآءَ ۖ وَكَانَ وَعْدُ رَبِّى حَقًّا

translations.text: He declared, “This is a mercy from my Lord. But when the promise of my Lord comes to pass, He will level it to the ground. And my Lord’s promise is ever true.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hatha rahmatun minrabbee fa-itha jaa waAAdu rabbee jaAAalahu dakkaawakana waAAdu rabbee haqqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَتَرَكْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَمُوجُ فِى بَعْضٍ ۖ وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعْنَـٰهُمْ جَمْعًا

translations.text: On that Day, We will let them<sup foot_note=76911>1</sup> surge ˹like waves˺ over one another. Later, the Trumpet will be blown,<sup foot_note=76912>2</sup> and We will gather all ˹people˺ together.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watarakna baAAdahum yawma-ithinyamooju fee baAAdin wanufikha fee assoorifajamaAAnahum jamAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعَرَضْنَا جَهَنَّمَ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَرْضًا

translations.text: On that Day We will display Hell clearly for the disbelievers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAaradna jahannama yawma-ithinlilkafireena AAarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتْ أَعْيُنُهُمْ فِى غِطَآءٍ عَن ذِكْرِى وَكَانُوا۟ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَمْعًا

translations.text: those who turned a blind eye to My Reminder<sup foot_note=76913>1</sup> and could not stand listening ˹to it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena kanat aAAyunuhumfee ghita-in AAan thikree wakanoo layastateeAAoona samAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَحَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن يَتَّخِذُوا۟ عِبَادِى مِن دُونِىٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۚ إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ نُزُلًا

translations.text: Do the disbelievers think they can ˹simply˺ take My servants<sup foot_note=76914>1</sup> as lords instead of Me? We have surely prepared Hell as an accommodation for the disbelievers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afahasiba allatheena kafarooan yattakhithoo AAibadee min doonee awliyaainna aAAtadna jahannama lilkafireena nuzula
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هَلْ نُنَبِّئُكُم بِٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ أَعْمَـٰلًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Shall we inform you of who will be the biggest losers of deeds?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul hal nunabbi-okum bil-akhsareenaaAAmala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعْيُهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَهُمْ يَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ يُحْسِنُونَ صُنْعًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those whose efforts are in vain in this worldly life, while they think they are doing good!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena dalla saAAyuhumfee alhayati addunya wahum yahsaboonaannahum yuhsinoona sunAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَلِقَآئِهِۦ فَحَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَزْنًا

translations.text: It is they who reject the signs of their Lord and their meeting with Him, rendering their deeds void, so We will not give their deeds any weight on Judgment Day.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika allatheena kafaroobi-ayati rabbihim waliqa-ihi fahabitataAAmaluhum fala nuqeemu lahum yawma alqiyamatiwazna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُوا۟ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِى وَرُسُلِى هُزُوًا

translations.text: That is their reward: Hell, for their disbelief and mockery of My signs and messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thalika jazaohum jahannamubima kafaroo wattakhathoo ayateewarusulee huzuwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسِ نُزُلًا

translations.text: Indeed, those who believe and do good will have the Gardens of Paradise<sup foot_note=76915>1</sup> as an accommodation,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati kanat lahumjannatu alfirdawsi nuzula
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبْغُونَ عَنْهَا حِوَلًا

translations.text: where they will be forever, never desiring anywhere else.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khalideena feeha layabghoona AAanha hiwala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُل لَّوْ كَانَ ٱلْبَحْرُ مِدَادًا لِّكَلِمَـٰتِ رَبِّى لَنَفِدَ ٱلْبَحْرُ قَبْلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَـٰتُ رَبِّى وَلَوْ جِئْنَا بِمِثْلِهِۦ مَدَدًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “If the ocean were ink for ˹writing˺ the Words of my Lord, it would certainly run out before the Words of my Lord were finished, even if We refilled it with its equal.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul law kana albahru midadanlikalimati rabbee lanafida albahru qabla an tanfadakalimatu rabbee walaw ji/na bimithlihi madada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۖ فَمَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا۟ لِقَآءَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلْيَعْمَلْ عَمَلًا صَـٰلِحًا وَلَا يُشْرِكْ بِعِبَادَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ أَحَدًۢا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a man like you, ˹but˺ it has been revealed to me that your God is only One God. So whoever hopes for the meeting with their Lord, let them do good deeds and associate none in the worship of their Lord.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innama ana basharunmithlukum yooha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahunwahidun faman kana yarjoo liqaa rabbihifalyaAAmal AAamalan salihan wala yushrikbiAAibadati rabbihi ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
